Package net.silthus.schat.pointer

Interface Pointered

All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel, Chatter, Configurable<T>, Configured, Identified, Identity, Message, MessageSource
public interface Pointered
Something that can retrieve values based on a given Pointer.
Since:
next

    • is

      default boolean is(Pointer<Boolean> pointer)
      Resolves the value of a boolean pointer. Defaults to false if the pointer is not supported.
      Parameters:
      pointer - the pointer to resolve
      Returns:
      the value of the pointer. false if it does not exist.
      Since:
      next

    • isNot

      default boolean isNot(Pointer<Boolean> pointer)
      Tries to resolve the value of the boolean pointer and returns the opposite.

      Returns false if the pointer does not exist.

      Parameters:
      pointer - the pointer to resolve
      Returns:
      the negated value of the pointer. true if it does not exist.
      Since:
      next

      Gets the value of pointer.

      If this Audience is unable to provide a value for pointer, defaultValue will be returned.

    • getOrDefaultFrom

      default <T> @UnknownNullability T getOrDefaultFrom(@NotNull @NotNull Pointer<T> pointer, @NotNull @NotNull Supplier<? extends T> defaultValue)
      Gets the value of pointer.

      If this Audience is unable to provide a value for pointer, the value supplied by defaultValue will be returned.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type
      Parameters:
      pointer - the pointer
      defaultValue - the default value supplier
